title: Wreckfest: Complete Edition – v1.280419 + DLCs + Bonus Content + Modding Tools
body:
Wreckfest: Complete Edition – v1.280419 + DLCs + Bonus Content + Modding Tools


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Racing, Physics-based, 3D, Cars
Companies: Bugbear Entertainment / THQ Nordic
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI13
Original Size: 25 GB
Repack Size: from 14.5 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: ZippyShare
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Wreckfest.Complete.Edition.v1.280419-CODEX ISO release: codex-wreckfest.complete.edition.v1.280419.iso (26,850,656,256 bytes)
  • All released DLCs are included and activated; game version is v1.280419
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of modding pack (includes editor, server, sample mods and mod tools) and bonus files (OST and wallpapers)
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 25 to 14.5~15 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~30 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~50 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 31.7 GB
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Break the rules and take full-contact racing to the limit with Wreckfest!

Expect epic crashes, neck-to-neck fights over the finish line and brand-new ways for metal to bend – These are the once-in-a-lifetime moments that can only be achieved in Wreckfest, with its true-to-life physics simulation crafted by legendary developer Bugbear, who also brought you FlatOut 1 & 2!

Burn rubber and shred metal in the ultimate driving playground!

Wreckfest is jam-packed with upgrade and customization options. Whether you are preparing for your next demolition derby with reinforced bumpers, roll cages, side protectors and much more, or setting your car up for a banger race with engine performance parts like air filters, camshafts, fuel systems, etc., Wreckfest is shaping up to be the best combative motorsport game out there.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is slightly backwards compatible with my previous Wreckfest repack. You can rehash this file: fg-optional-bonus-content.bin to save 170 MB of traffic.
